meanings.definition: A substance that enhances the carcinogenic effects of another substance.
meanings.sent1: The cocarcinogen increased the cancer-causing ability of the harmful chemical.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the effects of the cocarcinogen on tumor growth.
meanings.sent3: The cocarcinogen and the carcinogen teamed up to create a dangerous duo.
meanings.sent4: The cocarcinogen acted like a catalyst, accelerating the harmful impact of the chemical.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the cocarcinogen made the situation even more risky and concerning.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound that promotes the development of cancer when combined with another carcinogen.
meanings.sent1: The researchers identified a new cocarcinogen that intensified the cancer-causing properties of the compound.
meanings.sent2: The cocarcinogen interacted with the known carcinogen to accelerate cancer growth.
meanings.sent3: The cocarcinogen and the carcinogen seemed to be in cahoots, causing chaos in the body.
meanings.sent4: The cocarcinogen was like a dangerous partner in crime, aiding the carcinogen in its harmful mission.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of the cocarcinogen shed light on the complex nature of cancer development.
